response.job_title: M&A | Strategy and Transactions | Corporate development | Value creation
response.summary:
Over eight years of experience in M&A and strategy consulting. I have dedicated my career to help clients design and execute their corporate development plans, focusing on synergies, value creation, integrations and carve-outs.

I have experience in a broad set of sectors, including private equity, life sciences, automation and automotive (OEM, Tier1, Dealers).

Specialties include market and synergy assessments and valuations, carve-out planning and execution, integration, future state operating model design, operational, commercial and strategic due diligence, planning and execution (PMI), and Transaction Service Agreements (TSAs).
response.skills: Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Finance, Strategic Planning, Business Strategy, Flash Animation, Public Relations, Project Management, Strategy, Project Management Office (PMO), Financial Analysis, Management Consulting, Analytical Skills, Market Research, Business Process Improvement, Business Planning, Visual Basic, Photoshop, Illustrator, Stata

profile_positions.description:
Transaction strategy and execution | Corporate Development | M&A (Mergers and Acquisitions)

EYP Helps clients reimagine business eco-systems, reshape portfolios and reinvent themselves for a better future.

I use the strategy and transactions experience to help client accelerate their growth by advising on: Strategy, Corporate Finance, Buy and Integrate, Sell and Separate and Reshaping Results.
profile_positions.title: Senior Director

company.name: EY-Parthenon
company.description:
At EY-Parthenon, 9,000+ multidisciplinary professionals in teams across 120 countries help provide EY clients with corporate, transaction and turnaround strategies that are actionable, impactful and provide long-term growth.

Whether it’s digital transformation, sector convergence and dislocation, or financial and operational complexities, EY-Parthenon teams bring data analytics, leading technology and digital capabilities to a CEO’s toughest strategic issues. In doing so, EY-Parthenon teams can move quickly from idea to implementation to help clients realize their strategy with speed and certainty; we call this Strategy Realized.
